title: 8-10  Determining prime number
description:
Write a function that determines whether a integer is a prime number. Use the following function header:

bool isPrime(int num)

An integer greater than 1 is a prime number if its only divisor is 1 or itself.
For example, isPrime(11) return true, and isPrime(9) return false.
author: 程序设计I Chapter5 Functions
hint: You should submit the implementation of the function but do not submit the main() function.
